content.text: Once upon a time, in a small house, there lived a brave little toaster.
The toaster decided to go on an adventure. It traveled far and wide, encountering many obstacles.
The toaster stayed at home and lived a quiet life. The end.
The toaster fought the dragon and won. It became a hero. The end.
The toaster made friends with the dragon and they went on many adventures together. The end.
